Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: We were company of 4. And had chosen Chefs menu out of 4 courses, so we had a chance to try almost all dishes. I Must say it was overall a great and delicious dinner! I like the best herring with red beet mousse, pelmeni with beef, duck ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Not a place for traditional Russian cuisine, but rather for a fancy twist on it. Delicious food, great wine selection (including Georgian) and a helpful waitress. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Interesting selection of wines ranging from Georgia to Spain. Russian fine cuisine delivered with high etiquette and professionalism. Definitely a place to visit for lunch or dinner.

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: I came here with my Russian girlfriend, and we both LOVED the food. It was amezing, the both of us where blown away by the great food. The orange wine they had was great aswel. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Absolutely amazing! The food is delicious! I had the draniki and belyash and my son had the pelmeni  with beef. These were really tasty. Our waiter was awesome and very friendly with child. I cannot recommend this place enough! Such a warm and welcoming environment!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Fantastic Food and Warm Atmosphere. Dranniki was just amazing. Mead and Kvas kind of Russian fermented drink. So yummy! Good choice of natural wines!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text:
As a Russian, I find that this place proudly represents Russian cuisine and its flavours, without any noise (like clich√©s etc.)
Everything we tried here was delicious, and the visial was great! ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: I was curious to go & try Russian pelmeni in Amsterdam, read & heard good things about this place. Well we came, the service was great, the guy who was serving our table was very friendly, polite & welcoming. The food was ok but nothing ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Best meal of 2021. I'm grateful to the friend who recommended this restaurant serving "modern russian cuisine". I didn't quite know what to expect and went for the "full taste experience" from the menu. It turned out to be a real discovery ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Such a wonderful place! The food is really tasty, it‚Äôs authentic but with something extra. And I loved the subtle Russian touches in the decor. And Georgian wines are great!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: What a lovely evening we had here. Great food, with warm, layered flavors and a diversity of textures; crunchy, creamy, chewy, spongy and I'm probably forgetting a few. Our hostess was super nice, knowledgeable about the ingredients and ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Outstanding. Had the chef's choice and enjoyed every part of it

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Good vibes, amazing natural wine selection, friendly stuff. Recommend Draniki!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: No so many places where you can buy good and healthy food for your kid. But this one exactly what do you need. Beef pelmeni  exactly tasty and good like in Mother Russia)) Try specific Russian drinks - even better than I tried in Russia. Do not compare size of portions to prices, they are very reasonable as you will not be hungry after.

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: I have always heard about this place and never got a chance to go there until recently. Unfortunately, it was a bit of a disappointment - even though the food tasted okay, the prices and small portion sizes (regular pelmeni portion size ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text:
It was delicious, the food is great. 4 stars for that.
But there are some points why we don‚Äôt think we‚Äôll come back unless we are in the neighborhood and hungry. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Really cozy place for the atmosphere and the food is good. As a Russian I find that the food tastes like home :) finally have a place to invite my non-Russian friends and introduce the cuisine to them.

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Loved me meal. Am vegetarian and was pleased with the selection. Cozy atmosphere too üëçüèº

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Russian food with a unique twist. We really enjoyed it!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: we had lunch here and weren‚Äôt impressed. the portions way too small for the price, dishes look good but taste average. the staff didn‚Äôt know the menu, e.g. misinformed us about what sauce comes on top of the syrniki, and several items were missing.

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: This is the best place in the city to drink raf coffee! Syrniki and pelmeni meals definitely blowed my mind. Nice atmosphere and great people working here. Thank you!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Nice place with very decent but not cheap food. Staff is also friendly. And they make Raf coffee- something I could not find in Amsterdam after living many years in Moscow. Definitely check this place!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: There is a nice kvas, but pelmeni is really overpriced (10 euro per 4 pieces...) and tastes like a very regular dish.

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Really great food and experience! You would definitely want to try oluvie, beef or chicken pelmeni!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Gourmet Eastern European food. Mind blowing taste! Looooovie it

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: We enjoyed the atmosphere and the design of the place. However, the food is hard to rate, except Olivier and Borsch. These two were great, while pelmeni and dessert did not worth their price. Also, apparently, we did paid for one extra ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Pelmeni were good, as well as smetana, kvas and zapekanka. I also liked the vibe and service. What I didn't like was the amount of food and the price. I expected to get at least 20 Pelmenis for a big portion instead of 10 - come on, they're ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text:
Really good medovic and pelmeni.
As a plus, Georgian wine and friendly atmosphere.
And this place brews it's own kvas!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Delicious pelmeni that taste just like in Russia. Very juicy, especially good in combination with the home made kvass.

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Modern Russian food - refreshing, interesting, lovely! This is the first European location of a St. Petersburg-based bar. Lovely pelmeni, very inventive okroshka, fabulous honey cake (medovik). Liked everything I tried. Full disclosure - I‚Äôm Russian, and my Argentine boyfriend walked away impressed too üòä

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: We went there with friends and absolutely loved it! The food is delicious - authentic Russian food with a modern twist. The staff is really friendly and professional. They also have a great terrace and inside the restaurant it's really cosy and nice. Would definitely recommend it to o anyone!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: A bit expensive, but really nice Russian food üëåüèº

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Great food , healthy, tasty , very friendly staff. The service was amazing , the employee he came to our table and suggested to us the appropriate wine ! I congratulate the Greek employee Aris in the kitchen for the experience! All the plates was a piece of art

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Disclaimer: I worked at Oleg's Pelmeni Bar for about six months. Take this into account when reading this review. That being said, nobody asked me to write it and I'm being as honest as I can. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Love this place! Their food cominations are so surprizing and tasty. Service is friendly and they have an awesome natural wine collection.

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Friendly staff and nice vibe.

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: A very nice surprise. We had a lovely dinner with, of course, salad olivier, great dumplings and a nice desert. Small dishes and terrific quality. Definitely worth another visit

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Tasty food but small portions. Terrace is open but sitting inside is also convenient. You can pay by card.

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Really delicious Russian food with great owner who really cares about your well-being and enjoying the food. Sometimes can even do special Russian dishes. Has really great Georgian wines as well. I'm so happy they opened

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Had dinner here two weeks ago and was positively surprised. I did not know what to expect, but it was really a nice experience. The Pelmeni are all made in house we were told and are really nice with good sour creme and fresh topppings. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: pelmeni is great. the other dishes are a bit too fancy

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: We were really happy to come across Oleg pelmeni bar. Inexplicably nice mix of the traditional Russian cuisine and trendy pure interior. Great coffee and fermented beverages. I wish the portions had been bigger, that I get used to.‚Äã

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Best Russian ever! And nicest service

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: New beautiful place with a very friendly atmosphere! Dumplings are delightfully delicious!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text:
Went there for lunch. Restaurant is small and cosy but it has several negative points.
The prices are very high for the amount of food that you are getting as the ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: The food is fresh and tastes good. The size of dishes is more like tapas, you cannot be full with any of the portions on its own, however the price is like full main dish. Any person who eats pelmeni can confirm that we cook at least 15 ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Cool concept and fantastic service

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Not tasty food at all. It‚Äôs the only one ‚ÄúRussian‚Äù restaurant in Amsterdam by now, and they change traditional Russian dishes to something ‚Äúmodern‚Äù and not really tasty. Therefore, Oleg Pelmeni Bar gives a wrong perception of Russian ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: I tried Oleg Pelmeni for the first time yesterday with my friend from Russia. I asked him for advice, and he stated that a lot of the dishes were not correct. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: The Pelmeni definitely matches russian standards. The prices are a bit steep but the employees and location are excellent. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Beautiful modern decor and amazing place. It‚Äôs a great place for a long conversation over a light lunch and a nice drink. Food-wise I found the portions rather small (and hence on the expensive side), beef pelmeni I had seemed rather salty (for my taste). I‚Äôd probably come back, but for the ambiance, not necessarily the food.

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Great fusion of traditional Russian food with contemporary fashion. My top 3 dishes: chicken dumplings, Olivier salad, syrniki. And don‚Äôt forget to order home grown kambucha

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: I've only tried barszcz soup - but it weirdly tasted more like mushroom soup than beetroot.. nothow i know it from back home, and portion could be larger. Ok in general.

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Nettle pelmeni is an unforgettable taste experience! The combination of thin dough and nettle filling is surprising and delicious! The chef picks nettle in the forest himself!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: New place in town! Super tasty handmade pelmeni‚Äôs, fantastic Russian culinary experience. Nice selection of natural wines and perfect coffees. Go go go to check it out!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Pelemeni are delicious but pricey for the size of the portion. Maybe throwing in a few more will do the trick :) I loved the Georgian wines they have!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: As a Russian living abroad for more than 20 years I love to see a place like this open in my favourite city. I found everything tasting authentic yet with a modern european twist. ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: oh, finally great souls food in Amsterdam! you are amazing ü§ç

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: To be honest was one of my worst experiences. Ordered pelmeni, which were first too salty and cold, from the second attempt came with undercooked meat and the final third attempt was fine, but indeed such a small portion... I was so hungry ‚Ä¶

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: The portions are a bit too small for what you pay. Haven‚Äôt try everything but pelmeni do not  taste the same as home made Russian ones. Zapekanka was good, improved the experience.

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Atmospheric location, an excellent combination of a modern look at classic Russian cuisine. Georgian wines were very pleased!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: Nice place with simple and tasty Russian cuisine (finally in the Netherlands!). P.s. Olivier and beef pelmeni are the safest variant for your not-so-much-impressed-about-russian-food Dutch friends :)

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: I visited this restaurant in February 2020. It‚Äôs cozy place, wonderful and interesting cuisine, friendly staff. Next time I‚Äôll definitely visit this place again!

Name: Oleg Pelmeni Bar
Review Text: The best Russian restaurant I ever visited. Traditional Russian cuisine with a very modern twist. National food as it should be in 21 century
